name: growth (Sam A)
description:
A (not quite finished) turn-based strategy game. Made in 7 days for the 2019 7drl game jam.

The game can be won by engineering a situation in which the green cells control the majority of the grid. You can place 10 green cells and 10 yellow cells in an attempt to engineer such a situation. 

Every time a cell is placed rules will be applied to update the grid. After all of the cells have been placed these rules will be applied repeatedly until the grid converges.

Controls

space - start/restart

mouse click - place cell

g - place green cell on mouse click

y - place yellow cell on mouse click
